inputs.selection_motivation: Sofr sets the overnight funding benchmark that anchors the short‑end of the Treasury curve; its level and forward expectations directly shape the 30‑year yield through term‑premium dynamics and market expectations.
inputs.candidate_motivation: SOFR is a US overnight benchmark that is directly driven by Fed policy and closely tracks Treasury yields; it also influences and is influenced by US inflation, employment data, and the dollar’s value, which in turn affects major FX pairs.

proposed_link.motivation: Sofr sets the overnight funding benchmark that anchors the short‑end of the Treasury curve; its level and forward expectations directly shape the 30‑year yield through term‑premium dynamics and market expectations.
